title: Bilingual Virtual Assistant – Property & Vendor Coordinator
job_overview:
* Role Overview
Coordinate property cleaning and vendor services in Taipei, with future expansion to Japan and Bali. Use AI and automation tools to streamline scheduling, invoicing, reporting, and communication.

* Key Responsibilities
- Schedule & supervise cleaners, maintenance staff, and vendors.

- Manage invoices, payments, and service follow-ups.

- Maintain clear property logs and status reports.

- Build automations using tools like Zapier, ChatGPT, or Notion AI.

Provide bilingual communication (email, chat, phone) with vendors and stakeholders.

? Requirements
- Fluent in Mandarin & English (spoken & written)..

- Strong coordination, organization, and multi-tasking skills.

- Tech-savvy with experience in AI tools and automation platforms.

- Self-motivated, detail-focused, and proactive in problem-solving.

* Nice-to-Have
- Property/facility coordination experience.

- Familiarity with contract/vendor management tools.

- International coordination experience (Japan/Bali).
